physical_appearance: "The image displays a hexagonal flyer. ""Asian Film Archive presents Southeast Asian Digital Cinema"" is stated near the centre of the flyer. The logo of the ""Asian Film Archive"" is present at the centre of the flyer. There are 5 different images occupying the flyer. 3 of them feature the faces of people. The other 2 feature a close-up of an open mouth and the back of a person who is wearing a blue shirt
title_text: Southeast Asian Digital Cinema, hosted by Asian FIlm Archives Flyer for South Asian Digital Cinema, hosted by Asian Film Archives
subject_terms_2: festivals Motion pictures Arts, Southeast Asian
